welcome.title: Login with your Amazon credential
welcome.text: Please check if the domain is correct and then press the Log-in button. You will be redirected to your Amazon login page.
welcome.warning: To log in you must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network as Homey Pro.

server.ok: App is connected to Alexa server
server.error: App is NOT connected to Alexa server

devices.title: Alexa Devices
devices.text: Get a list of all your devices connected to Alexa to use in case of app malfunction

playback.timeout: Playback error (Timeout). Try restarting playback from your Echo.
playback.notSupported: Playback error. This feature does not seem to be supported by your Echo device.
playback.generic: Playback error. If the error persists try reconnecting the device.

volume.timeout: Volume error (Timeout). Try changing volume from your Echo.
volume.generic: Volume error. If the error persists try reconnecting the device.

error.invalidSerial: Invalid or empty device serial number.
error.invalidDevice: Invalid device or device not found.
error.invalidPowerSetting: Invalid power setting. Must be 'on' or 'off'.
error.speakCommand: Error sending voice command to Echo device.
error.generic: Error: if the error persists try reconnecting the device.
error.authenticationIssues: Authentication issues: to fix try repairing the device.
error.offline: This device is offline. Please check your device and try again.
error.alexaDisconnected: Echo devices disconnected from Alexa server. Try to manually reconnect.
